casebody.data:
LRC REALTY, INC.
v.
B.E.B. PROPERTIES 2018-1262 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 28, 2018 O'CONNOR, C.J., and O'DONNELL and DEGENARO, JJ., dissent.

APPEAL ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

First appeal of 112 Parker Court L.L.C., accepted on proposition of law No. I. Second appeal of LRC Realty, Inc., accepted on proposition of law Nos. I and II.

KENNEDY, FISCHER, and DEWINE, JJ., would accept both appeals on all propositions of law.
